Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kenmore
ShortDescription: Update: WB 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/87th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via: Cottage Grove, 83rd, Martin Luther King Dr., 95th, and Cottage Grove,  near Cottage Grove/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Cottage Grove, 83rd, Martin Luther King Dr., 95th, and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage, near Cottage Grove/87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/87th
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Martin Luther King Dr., 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near Cottage Grove/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 87th, Martin Luther King Dr., 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near Cottage Grove/87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
